Designer.question: How many years of design experience do you have?
What design software are you proficient in? (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma)
Please provide a link to your portfolio or attach examples of your work:
How would you describe your design style?
How many hours per week are you available to work?
Why do you want to join the ER:LC design team?

Developer.question: How many years of programming experience do you have?
What programming languages are you proficient in?
What frameworks and technologies have you worked with?
Please provide your GitHub profile or links to your projects:
Do you have experience with databases? If so, which ones?
How many hours per week are you available to work?
Why do you want to join the ER:LC development team?

Staff.question: Do you have any previous moderation or staff experience? Please describe:
What timezone are you in and when are you most active?
How would you handle a conflict between community members?
How do you plan to contribute to the ER:LC community?
How many hours per week are you available for staff duties?
Why do you want to become a staff member for ER:LC?
